net.sourceforge.JDash.gui
Class GaugeButton

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.GaugeButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
SwingComponent
public class GaugeButton
extends java.lang.Object
implements SwingComponent

This is a special button that conforms to the look and feel of a gauge. It is also capable of being triggered by a parameter.

Constructor Detail

GaugeButton

public GaugeButton(Skin skin,
                   ButtonShape shape)
Create a new standard button. If you wish to setup images for this button, use the setImage() methods.

Parameters:
shape - IN - the button shape to model this gauge button after. NOte. if the butto shape has a parameter trigger value set, then this button will NOT respond to the user clicking on the screen. Instead, this button will ONLY respond to the parameter values changing according to the values defined within the button shape.
skin - - IN the skin used to create this button.
shape - IN - the button definition shape.
See Also:
ButtonShape
